resources.string:
Instructions:
On this screen you can add/edit bugs that you discovered within the openstreetmap-data.

What is a bug:
A bug is for example a missing street, a junction, a wrong streetname or simply an unmarked postbox.
Just add a proper comment to the new bug and it will get fixed soon.

Adding a bug:
To add a bug, simply press the 'green plus'-icon to your right and position the crosshair above the errorous place.
Then press the checkmark-button to enter a description or the cancel-button to dismiss the new bug.

Editing a bug:
To edit a bug simply select one by touching its icon on the screen.
Then hit the edit-button in the lower right corner and proceed in the dialog.

Thanks to OpenStreetBugs.org for their API.

Please use this power wisely. =)
Error while appending comment to bug!
Successfully changed bug.\n\nRefresh visible bugs now?
Position the crosshair above the desired location...
You need to zoom in %d levels closer to contribute something...
Successfully added bug.\n\nRefresh visible bugs now?
Hint: E-Mail is needed for confirmation.
Invalid E-Mail Address entered.\nIt is needed for confirmation!
Success. You should momentarily receive an email.
Seems like it failed.\nCheck your mail anyway.
Hint: The name should pinpoint the POI in 1-3 word.
POI was added!\nIt will take some days until it appears on the map. Then, you can try clearing the maptile-cache in the settings. About a week will pass until you can search for it!
